item.title: Quarkus 0.23.1 released - Paving the way to our new HTTP layer
item.description:
DO NOT USE 0.23.1 - THERE IS A MAJOR REGRESSION!
We found a major memory regression in 0.23.1, we urge you to not use it and fall back to 0.22 if you have moved already
We just released Quarkus 0.23.1. This version is an important milestone for us as it materializes one of our major objectives: relying on Vert.x for our entire HTTP layer. It also comes with a lot of improvements...

item.description:
We just released Quarkus 0.21.1.

item.title: Tips to use Hibernate ORM with Quarkus profiles and live coding mode
item.description:
Quarkus live coding (aka dev mode) is really useful for applications that mix front end or services and database access. There are a few common approaches to make the best of it.
